                     throws RInterfaceException
Create an RList from a CDataCacheContainer. NB: doesn't automatically create factors like read.table does.

Parameters:

Returns:
rlist rlist
Throws:
RInterfaceException - if problem

toRList

public static RList toRList(Collection<?> col,
                            Class<?> stopClass)
                     throws RInterfaceException
Create an RList from the given Collection. Introspection is used to determine the bean properties (i.e.: getter methods) that are exposed, and each one becomes a column in the dataframe. Columns are only created for primitive properties and arrays of primitive properties; object properties are ignored without warning. NB: doesn't automatically create factors like read.table does.

Parameters:
col - the Java collection to convert.
stopClass - Columns are created for all getter methods that are defined by stopClass's subclasses. stopClass's getter methods and superclass getter methods are not converted to columns in the dataframe.
Returns:
rlist rlist
Throws:
RInterfaceException - if Collection cannot be read, or dataframe cannot be created.

extractMarkedRow

public static List<RVector> extractMarkedRow(Collection<?> col,
                                             String markedUpRowGetterName)
                                      throws RInterfaceException
Extract the values of a CMarkedUpRow that is retrieved via a getter method on a collection of beans.

Parameters:
col - collection of beans that expose a CMarkedUpRow.
markedUpRowGetterName - getter method used on the bean to retrieve the CMarkedUpRow.
Returns:
list of RVectors. One for each value in the CMarkedUpRow.
Throws:
RInterfaceException - if problem reading collection.

toRVectors

public static List<RVector> toRVectors(RList rlist)
                                throws UnsupportedTypeException,
                                       RInterfaceException
Create a list of RVectors from an RList.

Parameters:
rlist - rlist
Returns:
list of RVectors.
Throws:
UnsupportedTypeException - if rlist contains a type than cannot be converted to an RVector.
RInterfaceException - if problem converting a member of the rlist to a RVector.

readRFile

public static String readRFile(File file)
                        throws IOException
Returns contents of an R file. Removes "\r" in the string, because R doesn't like them.

Parameters:
file - text file
Returns:
contents of text file with "\r" removed
Throws:
IOException - if file cannot be read.

readRStream

                          throws IOException
Returns contents of an InputStream. Removes "\r" in the string, because R doesn't like them.

Parameters:
stream - stream
Returns:
contents of text file with "\r" removed
Throws:
IOException - if file cannot be read.
